meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4044.

td.p: Claire Williams, a grants coordinator from Oakton, Virginia
Mary Mansfield, a stay-at-home mom from Odell, Illinois
Hanley Baxter, a research analyst from Boston, Massachusetts (whose 2-day cash winnings total $44,202)

tr.td: UTENSILS
ATHLETES
ANAGRAMS
BRIDGES
OF MADISON
(Alex: Guess what's coming...)
COUNTY
